content: this cute crochet top is easy with no increases or decreases and works up fast the tee has a pretty lace pattern only the sides needed sewing wear this top in summer or in cooler weather as a vest or layer it it has a trendy and chic look skill easy beginner friendly finished sizes xs to 5xl material yarn any medium weight or weight 4 yarn of your choice can be used preferably use any yarn with cotton/ a cotton blend yarn yarn used by me nako natural bebe shade 991 yardage 225 m/ 246 yards in 100g of yarn each skein has 100 g material 10% viscose 14% cotton 76% acrylic amount needed 188 225 265 286 329 368 425 486 531 gm or 463 554 652 704 810 906 1046 1196 1307 yards crochet hook 5 mm or an h size hook notions stitch markers tapestry needle measuring tape scissors the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english this is a 10 page pdf pattern a print friendly version is available it has written instructions for the crochet pattern and detailed pattern row by row notes with pictures it does not include finished product it can be made in any similar yarn suitable for your hook there is a youtube tutorial that explains in detail and i have linked it immediately after purchase you will receive a pdf crochet pattern which is a digital download due to the nature of patterns this crochet pattern may not be exchanged or returned for a refund all sales are final please feel free to reach out anytime i am happy to help permissions/ copyright- please feel free to sell your finished items on a small scale but use of your own photos is required all pictures and patterns are copyright to lets all crochet © while selling finished items credit given to lets all crochet is appreciated do not use pictures or patterns for resale purposes the pattern cannot be shared altered or copied in any form click for youtube tutorials 1 etsy shop 2 instagram 3 1 https //www youtube com/c/letsallcrochet/ 2 https //www etsy com/in-en/shop/letsallcrochet 3 https //www instagram
